text: administrative procedure act definitions amend rsa to read as follows electronic document means a document which complies with requirements prescribed by the director for filing under paragraph vi and established in the drafting and procedure manual under rsa for electronic documents a requirement during the rulemaking process for a signature accompanying the filing of an electronic document shall be met if such signature complies with the requirements of rsa new paragraph administrative procedure act definitions signature amend rsa by inserting after paragraph xv the following new paragraph signature means a person s written name used as a form of identification whether in original photocopied or scanned form
